I think Taylor, as a musician, as a person and as an entity,...
...is one of the biggest exports from the United States of America,...
...so to have her seal of approval enough to take me on tour for six months with them...
...you know, instrumental to me breaking the States.
I'd been over to the States a lot, I'd had a bit of success there...
...but just having that stamp of approval took me from a theatre artist to an arena artist...
...and took me from a one-hit to a household name.
If someone has aims, dreams and aspirations to become a superstar,...
...she'd be the best example of it,...
